subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: The former Milwaukee Bucks star Sidney Moncrief joined the team as an assistant. Moncrief, 53, was an assistant with Dallas (2000-3) and Golden State (2007-9).
snippet: The former Milwaukee Bucks star Sidney Moncrief joined the team as an assistant. Moncrief, 53, was an assistant with Dallas (2000-3) and Golden State (2007-9).
